titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Employee Unions and Strikes, Yale University, Records
Employee Unions and Strikes, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:33

did.unittitle: Employee unions and strikes, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of flyers, news clippings, posters, buttons, and a videotape documenting union organizing activities and labor strikes at Yale University.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 36 (YRG 36), Records of Yale labor organizations

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Employee Unions and Strikes, Yale University, Records (RU 105). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transfers and gifts from various offices and individuals, 1984-1996

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of flyers, news clippings, posters, and buttons documenting union organizing activities and labor strikes at Yale University
